title: RAAF Record. Newsreel No. 08
creator_credit: L.H. Hicks, Stanley Brogden and Australia. Royal Australian Air Force. Directorate of Public Relations
brief_description: Cinemagazine newsreel includes the following: 1. RAAF’s Lockheed Hercules transport. 2. Supersonic “dart” is practice target for fighters. 3. “Sarah” (search and rescue and homing) is a new radio device for sea rescues. 4. The RAAF Antarctic flight visits the Soviet base.
creator_credit_for_label: L.H. Hicks, Stanley Brogden and Australia. Royal Australian Air Force. Directorate of Public Relations
